meanings.sent1: That guy who stole my lunch is a real asshole.
meanings.sent2: Don't be an asshole and help your friend when they need you.
meanings.sent3: The movie villain was such an asshole, always causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: Her boss was an asshole, constantly criticizing her work.
meanings.sent5: The bully at school was the biggest asshole I've ever met.

meanings.definition: A stupid, irritating, or contemptible person.
meanings.sent1: My brother can be such an asshole when he's in a bad mood.
meanings.sent2: She's always acting like an asshole, making fun of others.
meanings.sent3: The rude customer was being a real asshole to the cashier.
meanings.sent4: His lazy coworker was a complete asshole, never doing any work.
meanings.sent5: The class clown was seen as an asshole by the teacher for his disruptive behavior.

meanings.definition: A vulgar or offensive term for the anus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined his asshole during the check-up.
meanings.sent2: He fell down and hurt his asshole while skateboarding.
meanings.sent3: The comedian made a joke about his own asshole, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The toddler pointed to his asshole and asked his mom what it was.
meanings.sent5: The athlete had to apply cream to his chafed asshole after the long race.
